about_the_game:
It's the year 1000 and the war between angels and devils for the Earth has begun. Choose your side, grow your population of humans and expand your realm. In this strategy game everything is in real time, and time is a precious resource to manage.

Campaign

You have a time budget and 7 missions to complete. Use your time wisely.

City management

Your cities will need resources to expand and sometimes managing their logistic will get quite challenging. Use resources to produce the equipment for your army and craft magic items.

Auto battler

Define your strategy choosing the equipment for your soldiers. You can keep them safe with shields and armors, equip them with offensive or defensive scrolls, give them potions for the worse situations. Your units will decide by themselves how to use their inventory and how to attack the enemy.

Unique features

  • Auto-battle system, organize your squads and watch them fighting.
  • AI guided units, they are autonomous in battle once equipped with weapons and scrolls.
  • Everything is in real time. No waiting for enemy turns.
  • Handle multiple battles and manage different tasks at the same time.
  • Unique setting and factions, choose the pure Angels or the evil Devils.
  • Unique handmande illustrations, atmosphere and music.

  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs

short_description: Real time strategy, auto-battler and city management game. Organize and equip small squads of angels and devils in a procedurally generated world. Conquer and expand your cities in a campaign against time.
